review: I have bought two. One for upstairs and one for downstairs. So easy once first is set up and shows both so you can choose.

review: Don't invite friends over to watch something you plan to stream through this junk.Maybe it will work, maybe not.  Worse...halfway through a movie it will just decide not to work anymore.Nothing to do with your media or server...it just stops working.Garbage.  At least is cheap enough to throw away.
